cookbook.title: Modern Home Cooking
cookbook.author: Chef Maria Rodriguez
cookbook.introduction: Welcome to Modern Home Cooking! This collection features simple yet delicious recipes that anyone can master in their own kitchen. Each recipe has been tested and refined to ensure consistent, flavorful results.

recipe.name: Classic Pasta Carbonara
recipe.description: A traditional Italian pasta dish with eggs, cheese, pancetta, and black pepper. Simple ingredients combined to create an incredibly rich and satisfying meal.

instructions.step: Bring a large pot of salted water to boil and cook spaghetti according to package directions.
While pasta cooks, cut pancetta into small cubes and cook in a large skillet until crispy.
In a bowl, whisk together eggs, grated parmesan, and black pepper.
Drain pasta, reserving 1 cup of pasta water.
Add hot pasta to the skillet with pancetta and toss.
Remove from heat and quickly stir in egg mixture, adding pasta water as needed.
Serve immediately with extra parmesan and black pepper.

recipe.notes: The key is to work quickly when adding the eggs to prevent them from scrambling. The residual heat will cook the eggs just enough to create a creamy sauce.

recipe.name: Perfect Chocolate Chip Cookies
recipe.description: Soft, chewy chocolate chip cookies with crispy edges. The perfect balance of texture and flavor that will satisfy any sweet tooth.

instructions.step: In a bowl, whisk together flour, baking soda, and salt.
In a large bowl, cream together butter and both sugars until fluffy.
Beat in eggs one at a time, then stir in vanilla.
Stir in chocolate chips and nuts if using.
Drop rounded tablespoons of dough onto ungreased cookie sheets.
Bake for 9-11 minutes or until golden brown.
Cool on baking sheet for 2 minutes before transferring to wire rack.

recipe.notes: For chewier cookies, slightly underbake them. For crispier cookies, bake a minute or two longer.
